  • SEARCH: 
 

Package ohos.data.search

Provides methods for performing indexing and search operations provided by the fusion search service.

  • After creating a SearchAbility instance and connecting to the fusion search service, you can add, delete, and update indexes.
  • After obtaining a search session using SearchAbility#beginSearch, you can perform search operations.

Since:
3
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SearchAbility
    Provides access to the search service.
    SearchSession
    Represents a session used for pagination or group search.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SearchResult
    Defines the result status related to SearchableEntity.
